20110119025452.000|20110119025452.000|CC1|  to help significantly improve 
20110119025452.000|20110119025455.000|CC1|         lung function.         
20110119025455.000|20110119025457.000|CC1|  Unlike most COPD medications, 
20110119025457.000|20110119025457.000|CC1|         ADVAIR contains

20110119025500.000|20110119025500.000|CC1|        and a long-acting

20110119025503.000|20110119025503.000|CC1|         to help improve        
20110119025503.000|20110119025505.000|CC1|   your lung function all day.  
20110119025505.000|20110119025505.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 1:21:00 of 1:30:00
20110119025505.000|20110119025505.000|CC1|      ADVAIR won't replace      
20110119025505.000|20110119025507.000|CC1|      fast-acting inhalers      
20110119025507.000|20110119025509.000|CC1|       for sudden symptoms      
20110119025509.000|20110119025509.000|CC1|     and should not be used     
20110119025509.000|20110119025511.000|CC1|     more than twice a day.     
20110119025511.000|20110119025511.000|CC1|        People with COPD        
20110119025511.000|20110119025513.000|CC1|          taking ADVAIR         
20110119025513.000|20110119025513.000|CC1|        may have a higher       
20110119025513.000|20110119025515.000|CC1|      chance of pneumonia.      
20110119025515.000|20110119025515.000|CC1|    ADVAIR may increase your    
20110119025515.000|20110119025518.000|CC1|      risk of osteoporosis      
20110119025518.000|20110119025519.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.

20110119025519.000|20110119025522.000|CC1|        a heart condition

20110119025525.000|20110119025526.000|CC1|      difficulty breathing,
